title: EIP-4844 Spec Change Tracker
body:
Spec changes tracker in order to keep track of the updated tests.
```[tasklist]
### Tasks
- [x] Specify precompile input's z and y to be encoded as big endian (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7020)
- [x] Add explicit requirement of correct version byte for every versioned hash in blob txs (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7014)
- [x] change op to BLOBHASH (cosmetic) (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7001)
- [x] RLP transactions instead of SSZ (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/6985)
- [x] *No* Contract Creation on Type-3 Txs (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7100)
- [x] Add `data_gas_used` to header (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7062)
- [x] Reduce size of excess_data_gas to 64 bit: (https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7095)
- [x] Blob throughput increased https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7154
- [ ] Update Precompile Address https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7172
- [ ] Type-3 txs - `to` must be non-nil https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/7100
- [ ] dataGasUsed and dataGasPrice to receipts for 4844 txs https://github.com/ethereum/execution-apis/pull/398
- [ ] Add test of block with Network kind of type-3 transaction
```

All tasks need to update legacy TF tests and pytest, in case pytest has not been merged yet.
